org.ietf.nea.pa.message

Interface PaMessageHeaderBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ImMessageHeaderBuilder, TransmissionObjectBuilder<ImMessageHeader>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PaMessageHeaderBuilderIetf

    public interface PaMessageHeaderBuilder
extends ImMessageHeaderBuilder
    Generic builder to build an integrity measurement component message header compliant to RFC 5792. It can be used in a fluent way.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PaMessageHeaderBuilder setIdentifier(long identifier)
      Sets the message identifier.
